Package io.github.iherongh.wikicraft.arguments

Class WCArguments

java.lang.Object
io.github.iherongh.wikicraft.arguments.WCArguments
public class WCArguments extends Object
Contains and generates arguments to be used in commands.
Since:
0.1.0

  • Method Details

    • playerNameArgument

      public static dev.jorel.commandapi.arguments.Argument<String> playerNameArgument(boolean includeEntities)
      Creates a command argument for player names with customizable entity inclusion.
      Parameters:
      includeEntities - A boolean flag to determine whether to include entity selectors or only online players.

      If true, entity selectors (@a, @e, etc.) will be included.
      If false, only online players will be suggested.
      Returns:
      A list of StringArgument objects representing player names.
      Since:
      0.1.0

    • wikiPagesArgument

      public static dev.jorel.commandapi.arguments.Argument<String> wikiPagesArgument()
      Generates a list of pages on the configured wiki, to be passed as command arguments.
      Returns:
      A list of StringArgument objects representing all available wiki pages.
      Since:
      0.1.0

    • getWikiPages

      public static ArrayList<String> getWikiPages()
      Generates a list of users on the configured wiki, to be passed as command arguments.
      Returns:
      A list of StringArgument objects representing all available wiki users.

    • wikiUserArgument

      public static dev.jorel.commandapi.arguments.Argument<String> wikiUserArgument()
      Generates a list of users on the configured wiki, to be passed as command arguments.
      Returns:

      Since:
      0.1.0

    • configKeyArgument

      public static dev.jorel.commandapi.arguments.Argument<String> configKeyArgument()
      Generates a list of keys from the plugin's configuration file, to be passed as command arguments.
      Returns:
      A list of StringArgument objects representing all valid configuration keys.
      Since:
      0.1.0
